Adds missing tokens needed to activate a transition

  • net – Petri net
  • marking – Current marking
  • trace – Examined trace
  • traceIndex – Trace index

Parameters:

  • net – Petri net
  • initialMarking – Initial marking
  • finalMarking – Final marking
  • transMap – Map between transitions labels and transitions
  • enable_placeFitness – Enable fitness calculation at place level

pm4py.algo.tokenreplay.token_replay.get_placesShortestPath(net, placeToPopulate, currentPlace, placesShortestPath, actualList, recDepth)[source]¶

Get shortest path between places lead by hidden transitions

Parameters:
  • net – Petri net
  • placeToPopulate – Place that we are populating the shortest map of
  • currentPlace – Current visited place (must explore its transitions)
  • placesShortestPath – Current dictionary
  • actualList – Actual list of transitions to enable
  • recDepth – Recursion depth
